title: UC Gives Nod to Its Roots With Creation of a Tartan (University of Cincinnati)
text: ( Source : University of Cincinnati ) UC Gives Nod to Its Roots With Creation of a Tartan The University of Cincinnati paid homage to its roots with the unveiling of a tartan Oct. 16, and UC President Santa Ono , PhD, and James L. Winkle
